description: right after installing, the background is white and the text is not readable

Cant change the layout to a non en-us k/b.
No dark mode - actually, no settings!
Install app images show the MAC version has this.
Maybe next version.

Shows dark mode in the preview, but the app launches and is bright white with no settings menu. I spent ages trying to make ktouch support a dark mode (using qt5ct, and kvantum) and gave up deciding to get an app with dark mode available by default. So you can see why the lack of dark mode is disappointing.
